powerwalk.model.world

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • powerwalk.model.GameObject
      • powerwalk.model.world.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Person

    public abstract class Entity
extends GameObject
implements Interactable
    Class representing mobile objects from the RSBot environment

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        protected Entity(int x,
      int y,
      int z,
      int rawValue)
        Creates a new Entity at the given position. the rawNumber indicates the type of object as provided by the RSBot environment.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of this object
        y - the y-coordinate of this object
        z - the z-coordinate of this object
        rawValue - the raw value from the environment specifying the type

    • Method Detail

      • interact

        public void interact()
              throws OutOfReachException
        Interacts with this Entity using the default method.
        Specified by:
        interact in interface Interactable
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the interaction could not be completed
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when this Entity has no interactions, or when the interaction could not be completed

      • interact

        public void interact(java.lang.String method)
              throws OutOfReachException
        Interacts with this Entity using the given method
        Specified by:
        interact in interface Interactable
        Parameters:
        method - the method of interaction
        Throws:
        OutOfReachException - when the interaction could not be completed
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when the provided method cannot be used for this Entity

      • getInteractMethods

        public java.lang.String[] getInteractMethods()
        returns the available actions for this Entity.

        When the entity is not currently loaded, this method returns an empty array.

        Returns:
        the available actions for this Entity.
